title: What's the best way to look up similar songs on Spotify? - Quora

response.answer_text: See if you use Spotify Premium then there is an option called Song Radio. Suppose you like soft rock songs (as I do) and then you plug in your headphones and start listening to “Comfortably Numb - Pink Floyd" and after listening you decide that you want to look up to similar songs, then you need to touch on the 3 dots or lines, located at the top right (whatever duh!). And then you see the following options  See there is an option of Go to Song Radio. Once you open that, you will find a ton of unending songs, (some of which you've not even probably heard of) belonging to the same genre, and also from the same time period. So thats all.. and thats a fair advantage too in Premium version.. Anyways once you figure out all this, dont forget to save and follow that playlist. And also keep liking songs which you like from that same playlist. So that next time Spotify will edit and curate it accordingly to your preference. Also there are other ways, for Freemium (Non-Premium) users, Firstly, You can follow the Artist Radio You can check out the related Genre You can follow the “This is ***(Artist Name)***” Playlist So thats it. Hope you find it useful. Do give an upvote and share your queries in the comment section if you like/agree it. P.S: (Spotify actually has Song Radios for all the 50 million songs on the database , available to Premium users) Have a nice day listening to tunes on Spotify!

If your only using Spotify, Then you get a better UI on the computer APP, It will suggest similar artists, you just like on that and it there you have it. If you really want to get better results and listen on your phone and computer then look into Lastfm, its what its built for. Plus it builds lovely charts and stuff about your music habits. A must for any music nerd. It tells me everything and as soon as i go to the homepage it has artists similar to what ive listened to and been listening to recently too. Its super detailed and as a music nut i love it!!!! Last.fm | Play music, find songs, and discover artists
